title: Notice
content: Notice Examples A success notice  An info notice  A warning notice  An danger notice  Usage {{% notice success %}} A success notice {{% /notice %}} {{% notice info %}} An info notice {{% /notice %}} {{% notice warning %}} A warning notice {{% /notice %}} {{% notice danger %}} An danger notice {{% /notice %}}

title: Formatting
content:
Formatting Basic syntax    Element Markdown syntax     Bold **Bold**   Italic _Italic_   Strikethrough ~~Strikethrough~~   inline code `inline code`   Link [Link](https://google.com/), [Link](/site/url)   - Image ![Image](https://google.com/logo.png), ![Image title](/image/url)    Ordered Lists  First item Second item  First Sub-item Second Sub-item  Third item  1. First item 1. Second item 1. First Sub-item 1. Second Sub-item 1. Third item Unordered Lists  First item Second item  First Sub-item Second Sub-item  Third item  * First item * Second item * First Sub-item * Second Sub-item * Third item Blockquote  Blockquote
with multiple lines
 > blockquote > > with multiple lines Horizontal Line Example: ---

title: Code Highlight
content:
Code Highlight Examples Inline code print(x + "a") example
# Bash example function show_help() { echo "Usage: script.sh <param> param - Parameter " } show_help "${HOST}"# Python example def sum(a, b): return a + b def main(): result = sum(1, 2) print("result: {0}".format(result)) main() Usage Inline code `print(x + "a")` example ```python # Python example def sum(a, b): return a + b def main(): result = sum(1, 2) print("result: {0}".format(result)) main() ```

title: Cards
content:
Cards Examples 
Basic Were to start
  
Markdown Markdown syntax examples using theme
  
Shortcodes Custom theme features
   
Usage # With 3 cards per row on medium screens and up: {{% cards %}} {{% card link="/link1" %}} {{< icon icon="fa-tasks" >}} #### Card 1 Card description {{% /card %}} {{% card link="/link2" %}} {{< icon icon="fa-pen-square" >}} #### Card 2 Card 2 description {{% /card %}} {{% /cards %}}# With 4 cards per row on medium screens and up: {{% cards %}} {{% card link="/link1" size="4" %}} {{< icon icon="fa-tasks" >}} #### Card 1 Card description {{% /card %}} {{% card link="/link2" size="4" %}} {{< icon icon="fa-pen-square" >}} #### Card 2 Card 2 description {{% /card %}} {{% /cards %}}

title: Images and videos
Flowcharts (Mermaid)
content: Flowcharts (Mermaid) Examples graph TD; A[Hard edge] --|Link text| B(Round edge) B -- C{Decision} C --|One| D[Result one] C --|Two| E[Result two]  Usage {{< mermaid align="left" >}} graph LR; A[Hard edge] -->|Link text| B(Round edge) B --> C{Decision} C -->|One| D[Result one] C -->|Two| E[Result two] {{< /mermaid >}}

title: Roadmap
content: Roadmap Examples  1.0 Theme Done item In progress item Planned item  Features Roadmap Changelog Todo Lists    1.1 Theme Done item In progress item Planned item  Features Roadmap Changelog Todo Lists     Done In progress Planned   Usage {{< roadmap >}} {{% roadmap-version %}} ### Version 1 #### Section 1 * [x] Done item * [ ] In progress item * Planned item #### Section 2 * [x] Item 1 * [x] Item 2 * [x] Item 3 {{% /roadmap-version %}} {{% roadmap-version %}} ### Version 2 #### Section 1 * [x] Done item * [ ] In progress item * Planned item #### Section 2 * [x] Item 1 * [x] Item 2 * [x] Item 3 {{% /roadmap-version %}} {{< /roadmap >}}
